00030 /** 
00031  *  @defgroup ro_gpio GPIO/Port Routines
00032  *  @code #include <gpio.h> @endcode
00033  * 
00034  *  @brief Routines for controlling the general purpose IO-ports and signals
00035  *
00036  * 
00037  * This Routines are for initializing and using the general purpose I/O-Signals.
00038  *   
00039  *  @note Based on Atmel Datasheet for Atmega128, Nov. 2006
00040  *  @author Rainer Ostendorf
00041  */
00042 
00043 /**@{*/
00044 
00045 #ifndef GPIO_H_
00046 #define GPIO_H_
00047 
00048 /** Define for reading the Button. Value is true if Button 1 is pressed */
00049 #define BUT1 (!( PINA & (1<<PA0) ))
00050 /** Define for reading the Button. Value is true if Button 2 is pressed */
00051 #define BUT2 (!( PINA & (1<<PA1))) 
00052 
00053 /** Initialize the IO-Ports Direction registers (input, output)*/
00054 void init_port_directions( void );
00055 
00056 /** Initialize the IO-Ports Value registers */
00057 void init_port_values( void );
00058 
00059 #endif /*GPIO_H_*/
00060 
00061 
00062 /**@}*/
